title: Fox and Flask (Fuchs und Flasche) and Crane (Kranich) (in-text plates, page 21) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: Two from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (Fox, irreg.): 2 5/16 x 1 3/4" (5.9 x 4.4 cm); composition (Crane, irreg.): 2 3/16 x 2 1/4" (5.6 x 5.7 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
